title: 跪求地皮和平方法！
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.txt_content:
按照我的经验来说 difficulty: PEACEFUL

变成peaceful

之后/gamerule doMobSpawning false

一定可以！

replies.author: Tanglok
replies.txt_content:
在worlds.yml，改和平模式。

然后打/mv reload

replies.author: HuaiYang
replies.txt_content:
@1205507755 
话说你都有元老勋章了，这么古老的问题为什么还要问T T?
以下问题均可让这个世界无法生成怪物~

禁止天然刷怪:
/gamerule doMobSpawning false
更改难度:
/difficulty 0-3

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
difficulty: PEACEFUL

    spawning:

      ==: MVSpawnSettings

      animals:

        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings

        spawn: 'true'

        spawnrate: '-1'

        exceptions: []

      monsters:

        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings

        spawn: 'false'

        spawnrate: '-1'

        exceptions: []

把monsterspawn设置成false 如果不想动物生成吧animals生成也设置成false

replies.author: 时间time
replies.txt_content: 楼主/mv modify set diff 0 可以用但是貌似没保存配置所以导致重启后出现困难
